item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - The Alan Parsons Project - Tales Of Mystery And Imagination (Japan Deluxe SHM-CD)
item.description:
CD 1: Original 1976 Mix:
1. A Dream Within A Dream (instrumental)
2. The Raven
3. The Tell-Tale Heart
4. The Cask Of Amontillado
5. (The System Of) Dr. Tarr And Professor Fether
6. The Fall Of The House Of Usher: I. Prelude
7. The Fall Of The House Of Usher: II. Arrival
8. The Fall Of The House Of Usher: III. Intermezzo
9. The Fall Of The House Of Usher: IV. Pavane
10. The Fall Of The House Of Usher: V. Fall
11. To One In Paradise

Bonus Material:
12. The Raven (Bonus Track/Orignal Demo)
13. Edgar (Bonus Track/Demo)
14. Orson Welles Radio Spot
15. Interview With Alan Parsons And Eric Woolfson

CD 2: 1987 Remix
1. A Dream Within A Dream (instrumental)
2. The Raven
3. The Tell-Tale Heart
4. The Cask Of Amontillado
5. (The System Of) Dr. Tarr And Professor Fether
6. The Fall Of The House Of Usher: I. Prelude
7. The Fall Of The House Of Usher: II. Arrival
8. The Fall Of The House Of Usher: III. Intermezzo
9. The Fall Of The House Of Usher: IV. Pavane
10. The Fall Of The House Of Usher: V. Fall
11. To One In Paradise

Bonus Material:
12. Eric's Guide Vocal Medley (Bonus Track)
13. Orson Welles Dialogue
14. Sea Lions In the Departure Lounge (Sound Effecs And Experiments)
15. Unreleased Experiments

You must reply before you can see the hidden data contained here.
